member.name: T:Cumulonimbus.PatchHelpers
member.summary: Helper class for patching assemblies

member.name: F:Cumulonimbus.PatchHelpers.PROCESSED_TAG
member.summary: Assembly marker to avoid multiple weavings of the same assembly

member.name: M:Cumulonimbus.PatchHelpers.PatchAll(Mono.Cecil.ModuleDefinition)
member.summary: Finds all methods annotated with and executes them on the methods they're targetting in the given module.

member.name: M:Cumulonimbus.PatchHelpers.PatchMethod(Mono.Cecil.MethodDefinition,System.Reflection.MethodInfo)
member.summary: Patches a by invoking a patch method
member.param: The to invoke for patching the definition

member.name: M:Cumulonimbus.PatchHelpers.GetMethodInfo(System.Delegate)
member.summary: Returns the MethodInfo of any given delegate or function reference

member.name: M:Cumulonimbus.PatchHelpers.CopyDirectory(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Copied from https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/standard/io/how-to-copy-directories
Why.
member.param: The source directory to copy from
The destination to copy the directory to

member.name: M:Cumulonimbus.PatchHelpers.GetAllNestedTypes(Mono.Cecil.ModuleDefinition)
member.summary: Searches a module for all nested types recursively

member.name: M:Cumulonimbus.PatchHelpers.GetNestedTypeDefinitions(Mono.Cecil.TypeDefinition)
member.summary: Gets all nested definitions from a type definition recursively

member.name: T:Cumulonimbus.MethodPatchAttribute
member.summary: Attribute that can be applied to a method in order to turn it into a Harmony-style transpiler-esque patch for
member.param: The target type for the patch
The method to apply the patch to

member.name: M:Cumulonimbus.MethodPatchAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Attribute that can be applied to a method in order to turn it into a Harmony-style transpiler-esque patch for
member.param: The target type for the patch
The method to apply the patch to

member.name: T:Cumulonimbus.NimbusAssemblyResolver
member.summary: Dummy resolver to bypass the cache on the default one to not encounter file sharing violations

member.name: M:Cumulonimbus.Program.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: Main entry point, uses System.CommandLine for CLI

member.name: M:Cumulonimbus.Program.Execute(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Executes the patcher and re-weaves the targetted assemblies
member.param: The path of the Resonite Headless folder
Whether to run without user input

member.name: M:Cumulonimbus.Program.Msg(System.String)
member.summary: Prints a message to console

member.name: M:Cumulonimbus.Program.Warn(System.String)
member.summary: Prints a warning to console

member.summary: Prints an error to console

member.name: M:Cumulonimbus.Program.Debug(System.String)
member.summary: Prints a message when the project is in debug mode.

member.name: M:Cumulonimbus.Program.Initialize_Patch(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Mono.Cecil.Cil.Instruction},Mono.Cecil.ModuleDefinition,Mono.Cecil.Cil.ILProcessor)
member.summary: Patches the "Initialize" method in "FrooxEngine.LibraryInitializer" to remove the Ssl3 protocol as it's unsupported.

member.name: M:Cumulonimbus.Program.Process_Patch(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Mono.Cecil.Cil.Instruction},Mono.Cecil.ModuleDefinition,Mono.Cecil.Cil.ILProcessor)
member.summary: Patches the "Process" method in "FrooxEngine.Weaver.AssemblyPostProcessor" to

member.name: M:Cumulonimbus.Program.Abort_Patch(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Mono.Cecil.Cil.Instruction},Mono.Cecil.ModuleDefinition,Mono.Cecil.Cil.ILProcessor)
member.summary: Patches the 'Abort' method on the threadworker to call Thread.Interrupt instead, as Thread.Abort is deprecated
